Frequency once per hour

Effect Your dust bunny shakes and kicks to stir up dust in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5]. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. A creature that fails its save begins sneezing uncontrollably and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} and cannot take reactions for 1 round; on a critical failure they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 2}.
